content:
Make me a detailed day by day itinerary for a 7 night trip to Crete from U.K. emphasising nature and food and main tourist sites.

Make the itinerary based on the first two nights in Heraklion and the next three nights in Chania. 
For each day make an hourly itinerary with breaks for meals, coffee, and sightseeing and beach swimming. Give multiple options for food. 

Assume the trip will be in April. Note any major festivals ir Greek traditions on the island.
